mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info( file_name, format, parent_folder_id, content_url, created_user_id )VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{format}, #{parentFolderId}, #{contentUrl}, #{createdUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT file_id AS fileId, file_name AS fileName, format, parent_folder_id AS parentFolderId, content_url AS contentUrl, created_user_id AS createdUserId, created_user_date AS createdUserDate FROM file_info WHERE created_user_id = #{createdUserId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL

SELECT file_id AS fileId, file_name AS fileName, format, parent_folder_id AS parentFolderId, content_url AS contentUrl, created_user_id AS createdUserId, created_user_date AS createdUserDate FROM file_info WHERE created_user_id = #{createdUserId} AND parent_folder_id = #{parentFolderId}
